name: Ricochet (itch) (RageQuito)
description:
EVERYTHING IS MADE BY ME

This is my first game and is made for the 2020 VimJam,
The goal of the game is to collect 3 keys found across the map, shoot projectiles against enemies but be careful because all projectiles you fire, will be bounced back.
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left click to shoot
Right click to catch bullets
